description: Harvest is a time-tracking and invoicing tool designed for teams and freelancers, helping them log billable hours, manage projects, and streamline payments

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_CLIENT
tools.description: Tool to create a new client. Use after gathering client details to register a new client in Harvest.

inputSchema.title: CreateClientRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: A textual description of the client.

address.title: Address
address.description: The client's physical address. May include new line characters.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: ISO currency code for the client. If omitted, the company's default currency is used.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the client is active, or archived. Defaults to true.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new client in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_CLIENT_CONTACT
tools.description: Tool to create a new client contact. Use when you need to add a contact under an existing client. Call after you've retrieved or confirmed the client_id.

inputSchema.title: CreateClientContactRequest

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the contact (e.g., 'Director of Ops').

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client associated with this contact.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for creating a client contact in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_ESTIMATE
tools.description: Tool to create a new estimate. Use after gathering client and line item details.

inputSchema.title: CreateEstimateRequest

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: First tax percentage applied to subtotal, e.g., 10.0 for 10%.

tax2.title: Tax2
tax2.description: Second tax percentage applied to subtotal, e.g., 5.0 for 5%.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional notes to include on the estimate.

number.title: Number
number.description: If not set, the estimate number will be auto-generated.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency for the estimate; defaults to client's currency.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage subtracted from subtotal, e.g., 15.0 for 15%.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client this estimate belongs to.

issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: Date the estimate was issued (YYYY-MM-DD); defaults to today.

items.title: EstimateLineItem

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The name of an estimate item category.

taxed.title: Taxed
taxed.description: Whether the estimate's first tax percentage applies to this line item.

taxed2.title: Taxed2
taxed2.description: Whether the estimate's second tax percentage applies to this line item.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Unit quantity of the item (defaults to 1).

description.title: Description
description.description: Text description of the line item.

items.description: A line item to include in the estimate.

line_items.title: Line Items
line_items.description: List of line items to include on the estimate.

inputSchema.description: Parameters for creating a Harvest estimate.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_ESTIMATE_ITEM_CATEGORY
tools.description: Tool to create a new estimate item category in Harvest. Use after deciding to categorize line items within an estimate.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the estimate item category.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_ESTIMATE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to create a new message for an estimate. Use when you have an estimate ID and want to send a message or run an event (send, accept, decline, re-open) on the estimate.

inputSchema.title: CreateEstimateMessageRequest

event_type.title: Event Type
event_type.description: If provided, runs an event on the estimate. Options: accept, decline, re-open, or send.

items.title: EstimateMessageRecipientParam
items.description: Recipient parameter for creating a message.

recipients.title: Recipients
recipients.description: Array of recipient parameters. Required unless performing an event-only call.

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: ID of the estimate to add a message to.

send_me_a_copy.title: Send Me A Copy
send_me_a_copy.description: Whether to email a copy of the message to the current user. Defaults to false.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new estimate message.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_EXPENSE
tools.description: Tool to create a new expense entry. Use when recording costs against projects. Ensure either units or total_cost is provided.

inputSchema.title: CreateExpenseRequest

units.title: Units
units.description: Quantity of units to use for calculating total_cost. Required for unit-based categories.

receipt.title: Receipt
receipt.description: Receipt file to attach. Multipart/form-data upload not supported by this tool.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: ID of the user associated with this expense. Defaults to the authenticated user.

billable.title: Billable
billable.description: Whether the expense is billable. Defaults to true.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project associated with this expense.

total_cost.title: Total Cost
total_cost.description: Total amount of the expense. Required if not using a unit-based category.

expense_category_id.title: Expense Category Id
expense_category_id.description: ID of the expense category this expense is tracked against.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new expense in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to create a new invoice. Use when you have gathered all invoice details and need to bill a client in Harvest.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: First tax rate applied to the invoice (0-100).

tax2.title: Tax2
tax2.description: Second tax rate applied to the invoice (0-100).

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Percentage discount applied to the invoice (0-100).

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client to associate with the invoice.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The name of an invoice item category.

taxed.title: Taxed
taxed.description: Whether the invoice's `tax` percentage applies to this line item.

taxed2.title: Taxed2
taxed2.description: Whether the invoice's `tax2` percentage applies to this line item.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The unit quantity of the item.

description.title: Description
description.description: Text description of the line item.

line_items.title: Line Items
line_items.description: Array of line item objects to include in the invoice.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_INVOICE_ITEM_CATEGORY
tools.description: Tool to create a new invoice item category. Use after you have decided on the category name to register it in Harvest.

inputSchema.title: CreateInvoiceItemCategoryRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the invoice item category.

inputSchema.description: Request model for CREATE_INVOICE_ITEM_CATEGORY.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_INVOICE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to create a new message for an invoice. Use after confirming the invoice ID when you need to notify a client with invoice details.

inputSchema.title: CreateInvoiceMessageRequest

thank_you.title: Thank You
thank_you.description: If true, send a thank you message email

attach_pdf.title: Attach Pdf
attach_pdf.description: If true, attach a PDF of the invoice to the message email

event_type.title: Event Type
event_type.description: Invoice event type: omit or 'send' to send the message; 'close','draft','re-open' for state changes without emailing

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to message

recipients.title: Recipients
recipients.description: List of message recipients; at least one email is required

send_me_a_copy.title: Send Me A Copy
send_me_a_copy.description: If true, send a copy of the message email to the current user

include_link_to_client_invoice.title: Include Link To Client Invoice
include_link_to_client_invoice.description: Deprecated. Ignored if true; if false, clears payment options on the invoice.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for CREATE_INVOICE_MESSAGE action.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_INVOICE_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to create a new payment on an invoice. Use when recording a payment against an existing invoice.

inputSchema.title: CreateInvoicePaymentRequest

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any notes to be associated with the payment.

paid_at.title: Paid At
paid_at.description: Date and time the payment was made (ISO 8601). Pass either paid_at or paid_date, but not both.

paid_date.title: Paid Date
paid_date.description: Date the payment was made (YYYY-MM-DD). Pass either paid_date or paid_at, but not both.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to add a payment to.

send_thank_you.title: Send Thank You
send_thank_you.description: Whether to send a thank you email (if enabled). Only sends if invoice fully paid. Defaults to true.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new payment on an invoice.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to create a new project. Use after confirming the client exists.

inputSchema.title: CreateProjectRequest

fee.title: Fee
fee.description: The fee for the project when billing by project.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any additional notes about the project.

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: The monetary budget for the project.

bill_by.title: Bill By
bill_by.description: The method by which the project is invoiced.

budget_by.title: Budget By
budget_by.description: The method by which the project is budgeted.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client to associate this project with.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the project is active (true) or archived (false). Defaults to true.

cost_budget.title: Cost Budget
cost_budget.description: The monetary cost budget for the project.

hourly_rate.title: Hourly Rate
hourly_rate.description: The default hourly rate to use for this project when billing by project.

is_billable.title: Is Billable
is_billable.description: Whether the project is billable. Defaults to true.

is_fixed_fee.title: Is Fixed Fee
is_fixed_fee.description: Whether the project is a fixed-fee project.

budget_is_monthly.title: Budget Is Monthly
budget_is_monthly.description: Whether the budget resets every month.

show_budget_to_all.title: Show Budget To All
show_budget_to_all.description: Whether the budget is visible to all project members.

notify_when_over_budget.title: Notify When Over Budget
notify_when_over_budget.description: Whether to send a notification when the project exceeds its budget.

cost_budget_include_expenses.title: Cost Budget Include Expenses
cost_budget_include_expenses.description: Whether expenses are included in the cost budget.

over_budget_notification_percentage.title: Over Budget Notification Percentage
over_budget_notification_percentage.description: Percentage at which the over budget notification is triggered.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new project in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_TASK
tools.description: Tool to create a new task. Use after identifying task details to register it in Harvest.

inputSchema.title: CreateTaskRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the task to create.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Specifies if the task is active (true) or archived (false).

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Indicates if this task should be automatically added to future projects.

billable_by_default.title: Billable By Default
billable_by_default.description: Determines if the task is billable by default when added to a project.

default_hourly_rate.title: Default Hourly Rate
default_hourly_rate.description: The default hourly rate for this task when added to a project.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new task in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_TIME_ENTRY
tools.description: Tool to create a new time entry. Use when logging hours for a project by specifying start/end times or duration.

inputSchema.title: CreateTimeEntryRequest

hours.title: Hours
hours.description: Total hours to log; required when not using start/end times

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes or description of the work performed

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: ID of the task to associate with the time entry

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: ID of the user; defaults to the authenticated user

ended_time.title: Ended Time
ended_time.description: Time the entry ended (e.g., '5:00pm'); if omitted, timer remains running

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project to associate with the time entry

spent_date.title: Spent Date
spent_date.description: Date the time entry was spent (YYYY-MM-DD)

started_time.title: Started Time
started_time.description: Time the entry started (e.g., '9:00am'); omit ended_time for running timer

external_reference.title: ExternalReference

id.title: Id
id.description: External service's equivalent task or card ID

group_id.title: Group Id
group_id.description: External service's equivalent project or board ID

permalink.title: Permalink
permalink.description: URL of the external time tracking reference

external_reference.description: Links this entry to an external system (task, project, etc.).

inputSchema.description: Parameters for creating a new time entry in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_CREATE_USER
tools.description: Tool to create a new user. Use after gathering user details to invite them to Harvest.

inputSchema.title: CreateUserRequest

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the user.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Descriptive names of the business roles assigned to this person. Used for filtering reports, with no impact on permissions.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: The user’s timezone. Defaults to the company’s timezone. See supported time zones in the Harvest docs.

cost_rate.title: Cost Rate
cost_rate.description: The cost rate to use for this user when calculating project costs. Defaults to 0.0.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the user is active or archived. Defaults to true.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: The last name of the user.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: The first name of the user.

access_roles.title: Access Roles
access_roles.description: Access role(s) that determine the user’s permissions in Harvest. Possible values: administrator, manager, member, and additional manager roles.

is_contractor.title: Is Contractor
is_contractor.description: Whether the user is a contractor or an employee. Defaults to false.

weekly_capacity.title: Weekly Capacity
weekly_capacity.description: The number of hours per week this person is available to work in seconds. Defaults to 126000 (35 hours).

default_hourly_rate.title: Default Hourly Rate
default_hourly_rate.description: The billable rate to use for this user when added to a project. Defaults to 0.0.

has_access_to_all_future_projects.title: Has Access To All Future Projects
has_access_to_all_future_projects.description: Whether the user should be automatically added to future projects. Defaults to false.

inputSchema.description: Request model for creating a new user in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_CLIENT
tools.description: Tool to delete a client. Use when you need to remove a client that has no associated projects, invoices, or estimates. Call after confirming the client_id exists and has no dependent resources.

inputSchema.title: DeleteClientRequest

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: The ID of the client to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a client in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_CLIENT_CONTACT
tools.description: Tool to delete a client contact. Use when you need to remove a contact that is no longer relevant. Call after confirming the contact_id exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteClientContactRequest

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: The ID of the contact to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a client contact in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_ESTIMATE
tools.description: Tool to delete an estimate. Use when you need to remove an estimate that is no longer needed. Call after confirming the estimate_id exists and has no dependent resources.

inputSchema.title: DeleteEstimateRequest

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: The ID of the estimate to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an estimate in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_ESTIMATE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to delete an estimate message. Use when you need to remove a message from an estimate. Call after confirming estimate_id and message_id are correct.

inputSchema.title: DeleteEstimateMessageRequest

message_id.title: Message Id
message_id.description: The ID of the message to delete from the estimate.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an estimate message.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to delete an invoice. Use when you need to remove an invoice that has no associated payments. Call after confirming the invoice_id exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoiceRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an invoice in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_INVOICE_ITEM_CATEGORY
tools.description: Tool to delete an invoice item category. Use when you need to remove an obsolete or incorrect invoice item category. Call after confirming the invoice_item_category_id exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoiceItemCategoryRequest

invoice_item_category_id.title: Invoice Item Category Id
invoice_item_category_id.description: The ID of the invoice item category to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an invoice item category in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_INVOICE_MESSAGE
tools.description: Tool to delete a message from an invoice. Use when you need to remove a specific message that is no longer relevant. Call after confirming the invoice_id and message_id.

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoiceMessageRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice to delete a message from.

message_id.title: Message Id
message_id.description: The ID of the message to be deleted.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an invoice message in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_INVOICE_PAYMENT
tools.description: Tool to delete an invoice payment. Use when you need to remove a payment from an invoice after confirming payment details.

inputSchema.title: DeleteInvoicePaymentRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: The ID of the invoice containing the payment to delete.

payment_id.title: Payment Id
payment_id.description: The ID of the invoice payment to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting an invoice payment in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to delete a project. Use when you need to remove a project and all its associated time entries and expenses; invoices remain intact. Call after confirming the project_id exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteProjectRequest

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID of the project to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a project in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_TASK
tools.description: Tool to delete a task. Use when you need to remove a task that has no associated time entries. Call after confirming the task_id exists and has no dependent time entries.

inputSchema.title: DeleteTaskRequest

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: The ID of the task to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a task in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_TIME_ENTRY
tools.description: Tool to delete a time entry. Use when removing an existing time entry that is deletable (not closed or on archived projects/tasks). Call after confirming the time_entry_id exists.

inputSchema.title: DeleteTimeEntryRequest

time_entry_id.title: Time Entry Id
time_entry_id.description: The ID of the time entry to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a time entry in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_DELETE_USER
tools.description: Tool to delete a user. Use when you need to remove a user that has no associated time entries or expenses. Call after confirming the user_id exists and has no dependent time entries or expenses.

inputSchema.title: DeleteUserRequest

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The ID of the user to delete.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for deleting a user in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_CLIENT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific client by ID. Use when you need details of a client before invoicing or reporting.

inputSchema.title: GetClientRequest

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: The ID of the client to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific client by ID.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_CLIENT_CONTACT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific client contact. Use when you have client_id and contact_id to fetch and verify contact details.

inputSchema.title: GetClientContactRequest

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client the contact belongs to.

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: ID of the contact to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific client contact.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_COMPANY_INFO
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about the authenticated user's company. Use after authentication to fetch company settings for display or configuration.

inputSchema.title: GetCompanyInfoRequest
inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving company information. No parameters required.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_ESTIMATE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific estimate by ID. Use after confirming the estimate ID. Example: "Get estimate with ID 123456".

inputSchema.title: GetEstimateRequest

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: ID of the estimate to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific estimate by ID.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific invoice by ID. Use when you need the full details of an invoice after selecting or creating it. Example: 'Get invoice with ID 13150378.'

inputSchema.title: GetInvoiceRequest

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific invoice by ID.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific Harvest project by ID. Use when you have a project ID and need its details.

inputSchema.title: GetProjectRequest

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID of the Harvest project to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific project by ID.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_TASK
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific task by ID. Use when you have a task ID and need its detailed information.

inputSchema.title: GetTaskRequest

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Unique ID of the task to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific task by ID.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_TIME_ENTRY
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a single time entry by ID. Use when you have a specific time entry ID and need its full details.

inputSchema.title: GetTimeEntryRequest

time_entry_id.title: Time Entry Id
time_entry_id.description: The ID of the time entry to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for retrieving a single time entry.

tools.name: HARVEST_GET_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a specific user by ID. Use after obtaining a valid user ID (for example via List Users). Example: "Get details of user 3230547".

inputSchema.title: GetUserRequest

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: The unique ID of the user to retrieve.

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a specific user by ID in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_CLIENT_CONTACTS
tools.description: Tool to list client contacts. Use when you need to retrieve contacts with optional filtering and pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListClientContactsRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number to use in pagination.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records to return per page.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Only return contacts belonging to the client with this ID.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return contacts updated since this date/time (ISO 8601).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing client contacts.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_CLIENTS
tools.description: Tool to list clients. Use when you need to retrieve a paginated list of clients from Harvest. Ensure you have a valid access token in metadata before calling.

inputSchema.title: ListClientsRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: DEPRECATED. Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of records to return per page. Min 1, max 2000. Defaults to 2000.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Pass true to only return active clients and false to return inactive clients.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return clients that have been updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing clients in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_ESTIMATE_MESSAGES
tools.description: Tool to list messages for an estimate. Use after obtaining an estimate ID to retrieve associated messages, supports pagination and filtering by update time.

inputSchema.title: ListEstimateMessagesRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: DEPRECATED. Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records per page, between 1 and 2000. Defaults to 2000.

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: ID of the estimate to retrieve messages for.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return estimate messages updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing estimate messages in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_EXPENSE_CATEGORIES
tools.description: Tool to list expense categories. Use when you need to retrieve a paginated list of expense categories, optionally filtering by active status or last update timestamp.

inputSchema.title: ListExpenseCategoriesRequest

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records to return per page (1–2000).

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Pass true to return only active expense categories; false to return only inactive categories.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return expense categories updated since the given date and time (ISO 8601).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing expense categories in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_INVOICE_ITEM_CATEGORIES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve invoice item categories. Use when you need to fetch a paginated list of invoice item categories in Harvest.

inputSchema.title: ListInvoiceItemCategoriesRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: DEPRECATED. Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of records to return per page. Min 1, max 2000. Defaults to 2000.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return invoice item categories that have been updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing invoice item categories in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_INVOICE_MESSAGES
tools.description: Tool to list messages associated with a given invoice. Use when you need to retrieve invoice messages with optional filtering by update time and pagination.

inputSchema.title: ListInvoiceMessagesRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number to use in pagination (deprecated, defaults to 1).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records to return per page (1-2000, defaults to 2000).

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: ID of the invoice to retrieve messages for.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return messages updated since this date/time (ISO 8601).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing invoice messages.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_INVOICE_PAYMENTS
tools.description: Tool to retrieve payments for a specific invoice. Use when you need to list all payments applied to an invoice after confirming the invoice exists.

inputSchema.title: ListInvoicePaymentsRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: DEPRECATED. Page number for pagination (defaults to 1).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records per page (1–2000; defaults to 2000).

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice to retrieve payments for.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return invoice payments updated since this date and time (ISO 8601).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing payments for a given invoice.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_INVOICES
tools.description: Tool to list invoices. Use when you need to retrieve invoices filtered by client, project, date range, or state. Example: 'List invoices for client 5735776 from 2023-01-01 to 2023-01-31.'

inputSchema.title: ListInvoicesRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

state.title: State
state.description: Only return invoices with a state matching this value.

to_date.title: To Date
to_date.description: Only return invoices with an issue_date on or before the given date (YYYY-MM-DD).

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records to return per page. 1–2000. Defaults to 100.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Only return invoices belonging to the client with the given ID.

from_date.title: From Date
from_date.description: Only return invoices with an issue_date on or after the given date (YYYY-MM-DD).

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Only return invoices associated with the project with the given ID.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return invoices that have been updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing invoices in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_PROJECTS
tools.description: Tool to list projects. Use when you need to retrieve a paginated list of projects from Harvest. Ensure a valid access token is present in metadata before calling.

inputSchema.title: ListProjectsRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

client.title: Client
client.description: Filter projects by the client ID.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records per page. Min 1, max 100. Defaults to 100.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return projects updated since the given date/time (ISO 8601).

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing projects in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_TASKS
tools.description: Tool to list tasks. Use when you need to retrieve a paginated list of tasks from Harvest. Ensure you have a valid access token in metadata before calling.

inputSchema.title: ListTasksRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of records to return per page. Min 1, max 100. Defaults to 100.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Pass true to only return active tasks and false to return archived tasks.

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Pass true to only return default tasks.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return tasks that have been updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing tasks in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_TIME_ENTRIES
tools.description: Tool to retrieve a list of time entries. Use when you need to fetch tracked hours with filters or date ranges for reporting or invoicing. Example: "List time entries for project 123 between 2023-01-01 and 2023-01-31".

inputSchema.title: ListTimeEntriesRequest

to.title: To
to.description: Only return time entries with a spent_date on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Only return time entries belonging to the task with the given ID.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: Only return time entries belonging to the user with the given ID.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of records to return per page (1–2000).

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Only return time entries belonging to the client with the given ID.

from_date.title: From Date
from_date.description: Only return time entries with a spent_date on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

is_billed.title: Is Billed
is_billed.description: Pass true to return invoiced entries, false for unbilled entries.

is_running.title: Is Running
is_running.description: Pass true to return running timers, false for stopped entries.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Only return time entries belonging to the project with the given ID.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return time entries updated since this date and time (ISO 8601).

external_reference_id.title: External Reference Id
external_reference_id.description: Only return time entries with the given external reference ID.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing time entries in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_LIST_USERS
tools.description: Tool to list users. Use when you need to retrieve a paginated list of users from Harvest.

inputSchema.title: ListUsersRequest

page.title: Page
page.description: DEPRECATED. Page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: The number of records to return per page. Min 1, max 2000. Defaults to 2000.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Pass true to only return active users and false to return inactive users.

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return users that have been updated since the given date and time, in ISO 8601 format.

inputSchema.description: Request model for listing users in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_CLIENT
tools.description: Tool to update an existing client. Use after retrieving client details to modify its properties. Supports partial updates; omit fields to leave them unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateClientRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: A textual description of the client.

address.title: Address
address.description: The client's physical address. May include new line characters.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: ISO currency code for the client.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Unique ID of the client to update

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the client is active or archived.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing client in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_CLIENT_CONTACT
tools.description: Tool to update a client contact. Use when you have a contact_id and need to modify its details.

inputSchema.title: UpdateClientContactRequest

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the contact (e.g., 'Director of Ops').

contact_id.title: Contact Id
contact_id.description: ID of the contact to update.

inputSchema.description: Request schema for updating a client contact in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_COMPANY_INFO
tools.description: Tool to update information about the company. Use to modify company settings such as name, timezone, or formatting options. Use after obtaining current settings to apply changes.

inputSchema.title: UpdateCompanyInfoRequest

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The ISO currency code for the company.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: The timezone for the company, in IANA format.

color_scheme.title: Color Scheme
color_scheme.description: Color scheme for the Harvest UI (e.g., 'green', 'blue').

decimal_symbol.title: Decimal Symbol
decimal_symbol.description: Character used as a decimal separator in amounts.

week_start_day.title: Week Start Day
week_start_day.description: The day the week begins in the company settings.

thousands_separator.title: Thousands Separator
thousands_separator.description: Character used to separate thousands in amounts.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating company information. Only include fields to modify.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_ESTIMATE
tools.description: Tool to update an existing estimate. Use when you need to modify specific fields of an estimate; omit parameters to leave other fields unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateEstimateRequest

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: First tax percentage applied to the subtotal, e.g., 10.0 for 10%.

tax2.title: Tax2
tax2.description: Second tax percentage applied to the subtotal, e.g., 5.0 for 5%.

number.title: Number
number.description: Custom estimate number. Auto-generated if omitted.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency code for the estimate; defaults to client's currency.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage subtracted from the subtotal, e.g., 15.0 for 15%.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: The ID of the client this estimate belongs to.

items.title: EstimateRequestLineItem

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique ID for the estimate line item.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The name of an estimate item category.

taxed.title: Taxed
taxed.description: Whether the estimate's first tax applies to this line item.

taxed2.title: Taxed2
taxed2.description: Whether the estimate's second tax applies to this line item.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Unit quantity of the item (defaults to 1).

description.title: Description
description.description: Text description of the line item.

items.description: A line item to include when updating an estimate.

line_items.title: Line Items
line_items.description: List of line items to update or add. Omit unchanged items.

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: Unique ID of the estimate to update.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing estimate. Only include fields to modify.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_ESTIMATE_ITEM_CATEGORY
tools.description: Tool to update an estimate item category. Use after retrieving the category to change its name.

inputSchema.title: UpdateEstimateItemCategoryRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The new name for the estimate item category.

estimate_item_category_id.title: Estimate Item Category Id
estimate_item_category_id.description: Unique ID of the estimate item category to update

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an estimate item category.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_EXPENSE
tools.description: Tool to update an existing expense. Use after retrieving an expense to modify project, category, date, cost, or delete a receipt; omit fields to leave unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateExpenseRequest

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes or description for the expense.

units.title: Units
units.description: Quantity of units used to calculate the expense total.

expense_id.title: Expense Id
expense_id.description: Unique ID of the expense to update

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project associated with this expense.

delete_receipt.title: Delete Receipt
delete_receipt.description: Pass true to delete the attached receipt.

expense_category_id.title: Expense Category Id
expense_category_id.description: ID of the expense category for this expense.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing expense in Harvest. Only include fields to modify.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to update an existing invoice. Use after retrieving invoice details to modify its fields. Supports partial updates; omit fields to leave unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateInvoiceRequest

tax.title: Tax
tax.description: Tax percentage applied to the invoice.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Additional notes to include on the invoice.

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage applied to the invoice.

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client this invoice belongs to.

invoice_id.title: Invoice Id
invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice to update.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique ID for the line item.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Name of an invoice item category.

taxed.title: Taxed
taxed.description: Whether the invoice's tax percentage applies to this line item.

taxed2.title: Taxed2
taxed2.description: Whether the invoice's tax2 percentage applies to this line item.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project associated with the line item.

description.title: Description
description.description: Text description of the line item.

line_items.title: Line Items
line_items.description: Array of line item objects to update or add.

estimate_id.title: Estimate Id
estimate_id.description: ID of the estimate associated with this invoice.

retainer_id.title: Retainer Id
retainer_id.description: ID of the retainer associated with this invoice.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing invoice in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_PROJECT
tools.description: Tool to update an existing project. Use when you need to modify one or more fields of a project by its ID. Invoke after confirming the project ID and desired changes.

inputSchema.title: UpdateProjectRequest

fee.title: Fee
fee.description: Fixed-fee amount to invoice for fixed-fee projects

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Time budget in hours when budgeting by hours

budget_by.title: Budget By
budget_by.description: Budgeting method: 'project' (hours per project), 'project_cost' (total fees), 'task' (hours per task), 'task_fees' (fees per task), 'person' (hours per person), or 'none'

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: ID of the client to associate this project with

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the project is active (true) or archived (false)

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Unique ID of the project to update

cost_budget.title: Cost Budget
cost_budget.description: Monetary budget when budgeting by money

hourly_rate.title: Hourly Rate
hourly_rate.description: Hourly rate when billed by project hourly rate

is_billable.title: Is Billable
is_billable.description: Whether time on this project is billable

is_fixed_fee.title: Is Fixed Fee
is_fixed_fee.description: Whether this is a fixed-fee project

budget_is_monthly.title: Budget Is Monthly
budget_is_monthly.description: If true, reset budget each month; defaults to false

show_budget_to_all.title: Show Budget To All
show_budget_to_all.description: Show budget to all employees; defaults to false

notify_when_over_budget.title: Notify When Over Budget
notify_when_over_budget.description: Email managers when over budget; defaults to false

cost_budget_include_expenses.title: Cost Budget Include Expenses
cost_budget_include_expenses.description: Include tracked expenses in 'project_cost' budgets; defaults to false

over_budget_notification_percentage.title: Over Budget Notification Percentage
over_budget_notification_percentage.description: Threshold percent to trigger over-budget alerts (e.g., 80.0)

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing project in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_TASK
tools.description: Tool to update an existing task. Use after retrieving task details to modify its attributes such as name, billing defaults, or status. Supports partial updates; omit fields to leave them unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateTaskRequest

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: Unique ID of the task to update

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether this task is active (true) or archived (false).

is_default.title: Is Default
is_default.description: Whether this task should be automatically added to future projects.

billable_by_default.title: Billable By Default
billable_by_default.description: Whether new projects with this task are billable by default.

default_hourly_rate.title: Default Hourly Rate
default_hourly_rate.description: Default hourly rate when this task is added to a project.

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing task in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_TIME_ENTRY
tools.description: Tool to update an existing time entry. Use after retrieving the entry to adjust hours, notes, project, or task details. Supports partial updates; omit fields to leave unchanged.

inputSchema.title: UpdateTimeEntryRequest

hours.title: Hours
hours.description: The updated number of hours for the time entry.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: The updated notes for the time entry.

task_id.title: Task Id
task_id.description: ID of the task associated with the time entry.

ended_time.title: Ended Time
ended_time.description: The time the entry ended (e.g., '5:00pm'); if omitted, timer remains running

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project associated with the time entry.

spent_date.title: Spent Date
spent_date.description: The date the time entry was spent (YYYY-MM-DD)

started_time.title: Started Time
started_time.description: The time the entry started (e.g., '9:00am'); omit ended_time for running timer

time_entry_id.title: Time Entry Id
time_entry_id.description: Unique ID of the time entry to update

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating an existing time entry in Harvest.

tools.name: HARVEST_UPDATE_USER
tools.description: Tool to update an existing user. Use when you need to modify a user's profile or settings after confirming the user ID.

inputSchema.title: UpdateUserRequest

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the user. Cannot be updated if the user is inactive.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Descriptive names of the business roles assigned to this person. Used for filtering reports, with no impact on permissions.

user_id.title: User Id
user_id.description: Unique ID of the user to update

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: The user’s timezone. Defaults to the company’s timezone. See supported time zones in the Harvest docs.

is_active.title: Is Active
is_active.description: Whether the user is active or archived.

last_name.title: Last Name
last_name.description: The last name of the user. Cannot be updated if the user is inactive.

first_name.title: First Name
first_name.description: The first name of the user. Cannot be updated if the user is inactive.

access_roles.title: Access Roles
access_roles.description: Access roles that determine the user’s permissions in Harvest. Possible values: administrator, manager, member, project_creator, billable_rates_manager, managed_projects_invoice_drafter, managed_projects_invoice_manager, client_and_task_manager, time_and_expenses_manager, estimates_manager.

is_contractor.title: Is Contractor
is_contractor.description: Whether the user is a contractor or an employee. Defaults to false.

weekly_capacity.title: Weekly Capacity
weekly_capacity.description: The number of hours per week this person is available to work, in seconds. Must be non-negative.

has_access_to_all_future_projects.title: Has Access To All Future Projects
has_access_to_all_future_projects.description: Whether the user should be automatically added to future projects. Defaults to false.

inputSchema.description:
Request model for updating an existing user in Harvest.
Only include fields to modify; omit others to leave them unchanged.
